<S%G2532>And<s%> they shall turn <S%G654>away<s%> their <S%G189>ears<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> shall be <S%G1624>turned<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G3454>fables<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G5190>Tychicus<s%> have I <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus<s%>.

<S%G1161>Nevertheless<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3936>stood<s%> with <S%G3427>me<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1743>strengthened<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> the <S%G2782>preaching<s%> might be fully <S%G4135>known<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> that <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> might <S%G191>hear<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> I was <S%G4506>delivered<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of the <S%G3023>lion<s%>.
